title: Stylish remodel Apartment, Pets Welcome, Contact us Today
posting_body: ['VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>/', 'As a resident of Town Center you can easily walk to neighborhood shopping, fine dining, and local schools.', 'Contact us today!', "This floor plan is a 1 Bedroom Plus Den; den is standard sized bedroom without closet' floor plan is similar to 2bdrm/1bath.", 'The unit features full size washer & dryer included, nine foot ceilings with crown molding throughout.', 'Top floor units have wood-burning fireplaces and vaulted ceilings.', 'This apartment requires a $600 deposit.', 'Town Center, managed by Sack Properties', '3594 Mt. Diablo Blvd', 'Lafayette, CA 94549', 'show contact info', 'Monday 9:00am - 5:00pm', 'Tuesday 9:00am - 5:00pm', 'Wednesday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Thursday 9:00am - 5:00pm', 'Friday 9:00am - 6:00pm', 'Saturday 9:00am - 1:00pm', 'Apartment Features', '* Pantry', '* Walk-in Closet', '* Wood-Like Floors', '* Central Heat and Air', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Electric Stove', '* Window Coverings', '*', 'Roommate Friendly Floor Plan', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Full sized Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Quartz Countertops', '* Furnished Options Available, Call for Pricing', '* Fireplace', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', 'Community Features', '* Package Acceptance', '* Easy Access to Public Transportation', '* Controlled Access', '* Credit Cards Accepted', '* After-Hours Emergency Maintenance', '* Dry Cleaning and Laundry Service', '* Renters Insurance is Required', '* Outdoor Grill Area', '* Easy Freeway Access', '* Short or Long Term Lease Available', '* Bike Racks', '* Community Lounge', '* Corporate Housing', '* Elevator', '* Disability Access', '* Fitness Studio', '* Smoke Free Community', '*', "Our prices can change daily, price listed is based on today's availability.", 'Call for details.', '* Controlled Access Parking', '* We are a social community!', 'Find our Yelp, Facebook or Twitter page online.', '* Minutes from Restaurants, Shopping, and Much More', '* Professionally Managed', '* Garage Parking']
